titles.title: Source Of My Spirit's Deep Desire (easy)

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Source of my spirit's Deep desire For living joys that Shall not perish The patient hope Thy words inspire Still let Thy tender Mercy cherish{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}On Thee my humbled Soul would wait Her utmost weakness Calmly learning And see Thy grace its Way create Through thorns and briers Which Thou art burning{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Gladly my inmost Heart would know The love that now it Faintly traces And see the streams from Zion flow O'er all its waste And desert places{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}And still I hope O not in vain I know this holy Seed possessing Thou wilt come down Like gentle rain And make the barren Ground a blessing{/lang-eng}
